item.name: PC Application Key to Hyper++
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper Key.
It does, however, have a Caps Lock key that I never use.
This maps Caps Lock to Control + Option + Command (Mjolnir meta key).
Shift + Caps Lock does the regular thing.
A double-tap of Caps Lock maps to Control + Option + Space (open iTerm2 drawer).
